attributes.action: ensure that Hans Blix is called as a witness at the Chilcot inquiry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hans Blix has stated that he has not been asked to attend the Chilcot inquiry into the Iraq war.  He has also stated that he would be happy to do so.

As the former head of the UN Weapons Inspector teams responsible for searching for the alleged Iraq WMDs Mr Blix is uniquely placed to present pertinent and detailed evidence to the inquiry team. 

It is inconceivable that such a key player in the build up to the conflict should not be questioned at an inquiry into that conflict.  

We therefore petition the Prime Minister to ensure that Mr Blix is summoned as a witness and his evidence heard.

rejection.details: It is up to the Iraq Inquiry Committee, rather than the Prime Minister or Government to decide who to call as witness.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
